channel.title: [508]Text Edit and Sprite Edit Help[508]
channel.description:
ok guys..i know this is probably really easy and im just overlooking this..i been up literally all night with this frieking server..i just want 2 know how to do 2 things..this would make my life so much easier..
[img]http://i945.photobucket.com/albums/ad291/casper727/Untitled-3.jpg[/img]
1 = How do i make all the teleports light up like the lumby home?
2 = How do i change that text. I want it to say minigames, monsters, ext...
this is my 1st 508 and i was gunna release the source after i finish..just a couple things left and this is part of them..
